text: The men's 20 kilometres race walk event at the 2001 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Amsterdam, Netherlands, on 15 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Juan Manuel Molina ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Stepan Yudin ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| José David Domínguez ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 15 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
